entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:09 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
